stories.Title: Sooner or later
stories.Description: We were ready to celebrate the release of the long-awaited Cybertruck at the end of Q3, as CEO Elon Musk hinted, but Tesla's got other plans... Let's see if Q4 surprises us with a delivery event.
stories.Tweet: Sooner or later 📦 We were ready to celebrate the release of the long-awaited Cybertruck at the end of Q3, as CEO Elon Musk hinted, but Tesla's got other plans... Let's see if Q4 surprises us with a delivery event. #tesla https://www.theverge.com/2023/10/2/23899439/tesla-cybertruck-q3-delivery-event-target-miss

stories.Title: The show must go on
stories.Description: Tesla's journey toward delivering 1.8 million vehicles in 2023 continues. Although Q3 reports show a dip due to factory upgrades, the company's overall plan is proceeding smoothly.
stories.Tweet: The show must go on 📦 Tesla's journey toward delivering 1.8 million vehicles in 2023 continues. Although Q3 reports show a dip due to factory upgrades, the company's overall plan is proceeding smoothly. #tesla https://www.cnbc.com/2023/10/02/tesla-tsla-q3-2023-vehicle-delivery-and-production-numbers.html

stories.Title: Ready for global expansion
stories.Description: ZEEKR might be a young brand, but that doesn't mean they're not powerful. Just months after entering Israel's market, the Geely-owned EV brand is expanding its global footprint to the Middle East.
stories.Tweet: Ready for global expansion 📦 ZEEKR might be a young brand, but that doesn't mean they're not powerful. Just months after entering Israel's market, the Geely-owned EV brand is expanding its global footprint to the Middle East. #electriccars https://electrek.co/2023/10/01/zeekr-partnerships-sell-evs-four-new-countries-deliveries-coming-middle-east/

stories.Title: Chromebooks: affordability revamped
stories.Description: Google reaffirms its commitment to delivering reliable and budget-friendly Chromebooks. The new "Plus" badge introduces thrilling upgrades with AI, hardware, and software enhancements.
stories.Tweet: Chromebooks: affordability revamped 📦 Google reaffirms its commitment to delivering reliable and budget-friendly Chromebooks. The new "Plus" badge introduces thrilling upgrades with AI, hardware, and software enhancements. #google https://arstechnica.com/gadgets/2023/10/chromebook-plus-laptops-debut-with-hardware-requirements-exclusive-features/

stories.Title: Keep your cool
stories.Description: iPhone 15 users rejoice! Apple has addressed the overheating issue. No need to worry; it's not a hardware problem, just a few app bugs, and some iOS 17 glitches.
stories.Tweet: Keep your cool 📦 iPhone 15 users rejoice! Apple has addressed the overheating issue. No need to worry; it's not a hardware problem, just a few app bugs, and some iOS 17 glitches. #apple https://gizmodo.com/apple-overheating-iphone-15-caused-by-ios-and-app-bugs-1850891437

stories.Title: Apple’s latest move
stories.Description: According to Mark Gurman, Apple's search ambitions are on the rise. "Pegasus," its internal search engine, is expanding into the App Store and beyond. Are they ready to catch up with Google?
stories.Tweet: Apple’s latest move 📦 According to Mark Gurman, Apple's search ambitions are on the rise. "Pegasus," its internal search engine, is expanding into the App Store and beyond. Are they ready to catch up with Google? #apple https://www.theverge.com/2023/10/1/23898280/apple-google-pegasus-search-engine-competition-generative-ai

stories.Title: A high fashion debut
stories.Description: Technology is strutting down the catwalk at Paris Fashion Week, with Humane's AI Pin adorning supermodel Naomi Campbell during Coperni's show. A worthy debut for this highly anticipated wearable.
stories.Tweet: A high fashion debut 📦 Technology is strutting down the catwalk at Paris Fashion Week, with Humane's AI Pin adorning supermodel Naomi Campbell during Coperni's show. A worthy debut for this highly anticipated wearable. #ai https://techcrunch.com/2023/09/30/humanes-ai-pin-debuts-on-the-paris-runway/

stories.Title: AI for your tunes
stories.Description: Spotify's AI revolution is underway! Following the success of its DJ feature, a sneak peek into the app's code teases an exciting new possibility: crafting playlists with prompts.
stories.Tweet: AI for your tunes 📦 Spotify's AI revolution is underway! Following the success of its DJ feature, a sneak peek into the app's code teases an exciting new possibility: crafting playlists with prompts. #ai https://techcrunch.com/2023/10/02/spotify-spotted-developing-ai-generated-playlists-created-with-prompts/

stories.Title: Proceed with caution
stories.Description: We're aware of Apple's approach to new technologies, and in the AI race, they're often criticized for taking things slowly. However, recent statements from Tim Cook teased a ChatGPT-like creation.
stories.Tweet: Proceed with caution 📦 We're aware of Apple's approach to new technologies, and in the AI race, they're often criticized for taking things slowly. However, recent statements from Tim Cook teased a ChatGPT-like creation.   #apple https://www.techtimes.com/articles/297001/20230929/apple-going-out-ai-tim-cook-company-researching-chatgpt-service.htm

stories.Title: Let's go for a ride
stories.Description: SpaceX is the chosen one for NASA's next trip to orbit. The space company is set to launch the TRACERS smallsats in 2025, a mission destined to discover all about space weather and the magnetosphere.
stories.Tweet: Let's go for a ride 📦 SpaceX is the chosen one for NASA's next trip to orbit. The space company is set to launch the TRACERS smallsats in 2025, a mission destined to discover all about space weather and the magnetosphere. #spacex https://spacenews.com/nasa-selects-spacex-for-rideshare-launch-of-smallsat-mission/

title: Tesla's Q4 Surprise?, Chromebooks get an upgrade, Humane's fashion debut
description: Well, well, well, we've reached the end of Q3, and there's still no sign of Cybertruck deliveries. Maybe Tesla is keeping the element of surprise. Google has enhanced its reliable Chromebooks, and as you might suspect, they've added a touch of AI. Lastly, Humane's highly anticipated wearable made a grand debut at Paris Fashion Week – a beautiful fusion of innovation and creativity. I love it when my two worlds collide.
